ratings.comment: For anyone taking Sarah's classes in the future, I highly recommend going to her office hours AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE since she won't cover a single lecture's worth of material in one class period. She consistently had trouble teaching and her material content didn't match the exams. Good thing UW is discontinuing this math sequence.

She was the worst professor I have ever had. She often left lecture notes incomplete, giving up halfway through the problem because she was unable to complete it. The exams were lethal, and the difficulty did not match her teaching capabilities, let alone the content covered in class. She was also very defensive to criticism. Do not take her.
